Constructor Detail

LudoMessageBroker

public LudoMessageBroker(ITeamMessageManager msgServer)
Default constructor. The role of this class is to be a message-broker, and therefore it must have a manager to connect to.

Parameters:
msgServer - the TeamMessageManager.
